website_summaries.verdict: This large inflatable is packed with fun features and can accommodate more young water enthusiasts than many similar slides in its class.
pros: 7-in-1 model includes 2 slides, a climber, tunnel, water cannon, wading pool, and basketball hoop
Can fit 6 kids and 298 pounds at once
cons: A few reports of leaks and holes developing

customer_reviews.title: If they would just respond and replace water lines it would be 5*
customer_reviews.text: This thing would be 5 stars across the board if it weren't for dead animals being in water tubes/ sprinklers. Otherwise the thing is phenomenal but now I have a $700 piece of trash because I can't have my kid riding down a slide with water running though dead animals.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fun but a lot of work!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool inflatable. Very heavy. The water lines don’t line up right with the Velcro so we had to adjust them or just spray or splash water before sliding down. Runs a lot of electricity and water. When you go down the tail slide, it can scratch you on the hip bc it turns and your leg rubs the seam. Fun for the kids but I probably wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Epps

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. My 2 yr old loves it and we take it to his preschool on hot days for the kids to play on. 10 preschool age kids had the best time on it, and when it’s a little cold we put some exercise mats under the ladder and at the bottom of the slides and he just slides on it. Hours of entertainment and he sleeps really well those nights! Easy set up, it can take awhile to drain so give yourself about an hour to properly drain, dry, and put away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Treat

customer_reviews.title: quality of the material was overly advertise
customer_reviews.text: This inflatable pool bouncer it's okay my kids where able to have fun on it last summer . The material is not reinforce as described I did have a few issues with the plastic hose that goes around it also a few areas were leaking air but was still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Must dry it out completely before putting it away
customer_reviews.text: Heavy...had to roll out on a wagon but tons of fun
customer_reviews.author: Denice Garner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole and kink in the water hose where it’s supposed to shoot. But a diff brand.
customer_reviews.author: meeks777

customer_reviews.title: Had to adjust the water spray but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.text: The kids enjoyed it very much but the only problem I had was the velcro that holds the water spray. It wasn't place at a correct place so the water sprays outside of the slide.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't the easiest order - but Great Customer Service prevailed! Seller was quick to respond and resolve my shipping question. This is a great product for the summer - highly recommend for hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: K. LJ

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very cool for my 7 and 8 year old even better that it is water efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert adame

customer_reviews.title: Kids fun favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 kids love it!! In the hotter days the pool helps keep the slide cool for the kids or socks is needed if there’s sliding with no water is being used!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy up and down but, most importantly endless fun!
customer_reviews.text: Set is very easy & quick. Inflation is super fast. Grandkids from 2-10 years old have had endless hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Trina L Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Swimming Pool
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nice swimming pool. I would recommend this swimming pool to everyone. My 3 years old enjoys it a lot. It was worth of spending money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dbdiscountdrugs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Waterslide!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome waterslide! My son plays on it for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Grandkids, much better than expected on quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Huge water waster
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love this thing but for their parents there is one huge drawback. To fill it you need to blow it up and then it takes a huge amount of water. As soon as you turn off the blower pump it starts deflating and dumping all the water. If you want to use it again the next day you have to waste the same amount of water all over again. Huge waste of water. There should be a sperate closable chamber to hold all of that water until you choose to drain it.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. M.

product_meta.title: Costzon Inflatable Water Park, Giant 7 in 1 Crocodile Bounce House w/Two Water Slides, Climb Wall, Basketball Rim, Tunnel, Kids Water Pool, Including Carry Bag, Hose, Repair Kit (With 780W Air Blower)
feature_bullets: ☀️ Multiple Play Areas: With two water slides, a splash pool, a climbing wall, a basketball rim, a water cannon and an easy-to-pass tunnel , kids can enjoy the fun of a variety of games at the same time. Many game areas in the inflatable can also exercise children's balance and promote their growth, such as climbing wall and basketball rim.

🌊 Enjoy Water Fun: Connect the hose it can be used as a water park, children will have endless fun with this inflatable water slide. Sliding down the two water slides with sprinkler, spraying your friends with water cannon or lounging around in the splash pool, this water slide park brings a cool summer to the children.

💕 Durable Materials and Safe Design: Made of premium oxford materials with a PVC coat, which is wear resistant. Exquisite craftsmanship plus high quality material selection makes sure it can accompany your kids for many years. The connecting area is surrounded by mesh walls to ensure the safety of children while playing and allow for maximum ventilation. Max weight capacity of inflatable part: 298 lbs (Suggestion: every kid's weight should be under 99 lbs). Suitable for 6 kids play together.

🏖️ Quick Inflation & Deflation: Equipped with a high speed 780W blower that inflates the inflatable slide bouncer in just 2 minutes and keep the whole structure standing tall during use. In addition, it can complete the deflation process just in a few minutes. It is suitable for use in yard, park , lawn, etc.

😊 Sweet Accessories: In order to meet your needs better, we have provided you with some accessories. A hose for added enjoyment, a carrying bag for easy storage and transportation. 4 blower stakes and 5 bouncer stakes for ensuring the safety of children better and a repair kit (in random color) for easy maintenance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
